article_node.title: Cook Files Lawsuit, Nvidia's Earnings Letdown
article_node.summary: Lisa Cook has filed a lawsuit against President Donald Trump after his attempt to remove her from the Federal Reserve, raising concerns about Fed independence and potential market volatility. Meanwhile, Nvidia reported disappointing earnings, with AI server sales falling short of expectations, leading to a sharp decline in its stock. The combination of political uncertainty and tech earnings miss has weighed on equity markets, particularly tech and AI-focused stocks, while broader market indices experienced a modest decline.
